record.description: Shh! Girls at work. Pat O'Kelly of Royal Oak, Michigan, goes into her dance routine during drills for Quiet! Dress Rehearsal, to be presented by a University of Chicago cast for wounded veterans at Gardiner Hospital Wednesday. Others in the group are (left to right) Elaine Posner (holding sign), Hammond, Indiana; Given Schmidt, Whiting, Indiana; Georgia Lampros, Kalamazoo, Michigan; Flora Ann Solon, 5844 S. University Avenue, and Gloria Sandalis of 6950 S. Harvard Avenue.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping. Crease across the bottom, in mylar. Paint on surface.
